description: Maps alternate school names to canonical names to prevent duplicates when merging TABC, MaxPreps, and GASO rankings
notes: TABC often uses abbreviated city prefixes: FB=Fort Bend, Hou=Houston, SA=San Antonio, FW=Fort Worth
MaxPreps sometimes uses full city names or different abbreviations
GASO may use shortened school names without city prefix
Always check for hyphenation differences (Liberty-Eylau vs Liberty Eylau)
Watch for schools that moved classifications between years

known_duplicates_fixed.reason: Only appeared in GASO rankings, not validated by TABC or MaxPreps
